page.title: 13Worksop Bypass
page.content: At present a bypass is being constructed which, when complete, will run from the S of Manton and then swing NW around the W edge of Worksop. It will be part of the A57 trunk road and will indirectly link the A1 with the M1. It is being built to relieve congestion in Worksop town centre. Even with a one_way system enforced in some areas of the town centre the roads are having difficulty in coping with the large amount of surplus traffic which will be directed around the town via the faster dual/single carriageway road. However, there were several factors in opposition to the construction as well. The flat land ideal for the highway is, in some areas, valuable agricultural land, thus affecting local farming.
